segments.text: I see the open window casting light across the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a pleasant view of the garden outside, so orderly and bright.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, there’s this chaotic ballet of mischief unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still polishing her plate, completely unaware of the child's impending fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading out of the sink, and the floor is becoming a hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself frustrated at how she doesn’t see the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like the children are putting on a show, but I fear there might be a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
